actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To provide the President with the authority to maintain the essential domestic services of the Government while a sequestration order is in effect.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to apportion the amount sequestered from non-defense programs to preserve essential services while a sequestration order is in effect pursuant to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

titles.title: To provide the President with the authority to maintain the essential domestic services of the Government while a sequestration order is in effect.
